attribs.name: repeating_proficiencies_-LCVxAbnBudeSQ3iK0ti_name
attribs.current: Light armor, medium armor, shields, heavy armor

attribs.name: repeating_proficiencies_-LCoqnm0ZYANOSmdoK0Q_name
attribs.current: Daggers, Darts, Slings, Quarterstaffs, Light Crossbows, Martial Weapons

attribs.name: repeating_proficiencies_-LCoqtpGMaBGfUAUrwCz_name
attribs.current: Common, Sylvan, Primordial (Aquan, Auran, Igan, Terran)

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCosf7jeYoAFJjvbktH_description
attribs.current:
If confronted by any intelliegent elemental spirit, you can invoke the ancient ways of communion between your kid and theirs.  You make a great display of respect and tradition, and the entity is inclined to be more favorable to you and your party. 

Communing gives an opening: An intelligent spirit may give a chance to talk, a friendly spirit may be more helpful, and a hostile spirit may rethink a violent act.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: The spirit world is a terrible and brutal place, and so am I.

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: My life is my devotion to my people and their traditions

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I am deeply mistrustful of members of other faiths

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCouLKZo-6d71rXlzrt_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCouLKZo-6d71rXlzrt_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCouN5y7Z7F7gZBN32S_itemcontent
attribs.current: This wooden case can hold up to twenty crossbow bolts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCouNSuw7BP5NVzjfwK_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCoud-oH9DhOTetzD98_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Includes:

• a backpack

• a bedroll

• a mess kit

• a tinderbox

• 10 torches

• 10 days of rations

• a waterskin

• 50 feet of hempen rope

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCouf59rzuhJqQBnzLv_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCov0bsMA9YUQNa3Ymk_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a successful melee attack with a weapon against one creature. On hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and if the target willingly moves before the end of your next turn, it immediately takes 1d8 thunder damage, and the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCov0bsMA9YUQNa3Ymk_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 thunder damage to the target, and the moving damage increases to 2d8. Both damages increase by 1d8 at 11th and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LCovB0nsljnT83Ok9sh_atk_desc
attribs.current:
Make a successful melee attack with a weapon against one creature. On hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and if the target willingly moves before the end of your next turn, it immediately takes 1d8 thunder damage, and the spell ends.

At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 thunder damage to the target, and the moving damage increases to 2d8. Both damages increase by 1d8 at 11th and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCovP174tyL-0DWGiol_itemcontent
attribs.current: This kit contains a variety of instruments such as clippers, mortar and pestle, and pouches and vials used by herbalists to create remedies and potions. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any Ability Checks you make to Identify or apply herbs. Also, proficiency with this kit is required to create Antitoxin and potions of healing.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCovQHSZl1O-4ZCNmOG_itemcontent
attribs.current: A poisoner’s kit includes the vials, chemicals, and other Equipment necessary for the Creation of Poisons. Proficiency with this kit lets you add your proficiency bonus to any Ability Checks you make to craft or use Poisons.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCovTglxdrIUxByjoHv_itemcontent
attribs.current: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 sling bullets or 50 blowgun needles, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a component pouch. A pouch can hold up to 1/5 cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCovUbLgLiQc9nDC0p-_itemcontent
attribs.current: A component pouch is a small, watertight leather belt pouch that has compartments to hold all the material Components and other Special items you need to cast your Spells, except for those Components that have a specific cost (as indicated in a spell's description).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCovcz12Xlbfm3yMMEZ_spelldescription
attribs.current:
Lightning springs from your hand to deliver a shock to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal. On a hit, the target takes 1d8 lightning damage, and it can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCowIujRksJ7m36dTAA_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You touch one object that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCoyXWv4fx1h5wS2KZG_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCoylP8UMwZyZGvEgFe_spelldescription
attribs.current: Make a ranged spell attack against a creature you can see. You choose the damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. If the attack hits, the creature takes 3d8 damage of the type you chose.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCoylP8UMwZyZGvEgFe_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LCoywXytDEe7QtgDl8i_atk_desc
attribs.current:
Make a ranged spell attack against a creature you can see. You choose the damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder. If the attack hits, the creature takes 3d8 damage of the type you chose.

At Higher Levels: The damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCozZLlpzvOabqenA2v_description
attribs.current: The arcane magic you command is infused with elemental air.  You can speak, read, and write Primordial.  Knowing this lanague allows you to understand and be understood by those who speak its dialects: Aquan, Auran, Ignan, and Terran

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCozpaQA7WIupYMI7ZJ_description
attribs.current: Starting at 1st level, you can use a bonus action on your turn to cause whirling gusts of elemental air to briefly surround you, immediately before or after you cast a spell of 1st level or higher.  Doing so allows you to fly up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCpjSDhBnwfbNFXw9bb_description
attribs.current: If you move at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hit it with a melee weapon attack on the same turn, roll the weapon's damage dice twice and add them together.  Once you use this ability, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCpjcF-3mOnlQMIWnbk_description
attribs.current: Your hooves are natural melee weapons, with which you're proficient.  If you hit with a hoof, the target takes bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + Strength modifier.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCpjmTRIqQ6Q1BpVLgy_description
attribs.current:
You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push or drag.
   In addition, any climb that requires hands and feet is especially difficult for you because of your hooves.  When you make such a climb, each foot of movement costs you 4 extra feet, instead of the normal 1 extra foot.
   Finally, a medium or smaller creature can ride on your equine back if you allow it.  In such a situation, you continue to act independently, not as a controlled mount.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCpk5HE603WJfxbE5lo_description
attribs.current: You  have proficiency in the Survival skill.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCpkAAlK1njE9mhlHrS_description
attribs.current: You have two creature types: Humanoid and monstrosity.  You can be affected by a game effect if it works on either of your creature types.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCprImV9oZkwRV9LZi1_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

This spell's damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10), and 17th level (4d10).

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCq5syPAy9QXp1yUcEU_itemcontent
attribs.current: This kit is a leather pouch containing bandages, salves, and splints. The kit has ten uses. As an action, you can expend one use of the kit to stabilize a creature that has 0 hit points, without needing to make a Wisdom (Medicine) check.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCqHnbSjDALcG6sDTY7_spelldescription
attribs.current:
This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn clack, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage.

This spell can physically repair a magic item or construct, but the spell can't restore magic to such an object.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCqHuZ19qanSnrCOHYf_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch a living creature that has 0 hit points. The  creature becomes stable. This spell has no effect on  undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCqHw6xuz5Sz0KT2NDB_spelldescription
attribs.current: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCqI8IZF7zOD4ZESuoQ_spelldescription
attribs.current: You bless up to three creatures of your choice within range. Whenever a target makes an attack roll or a saving throw before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the attack roll or saving throw.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCqI8IZF7zOD4ZESuoQ_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCqICZZg9UzmhgdTczH_spelldescription
attribs.current: A creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCqICZZg9UzmhgdTczH_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCqIg2iTvEUxUL8Gzg-_description
attribs.current:
When a creature within 5 feet of you that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to cause the creature to make a Dexterity saving throw.  The creature takes 2d8 lightning or thunder damage (your choice) on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.
   You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier.  You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCqX8i4Mc2sEg2m59Ub_itemcontent
attribs.current: This armor is made of narrow vertical strips of metal riveted to a backing of leather that is worn over cloth padding. Flexible chain mail protects the joints.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCqXAM8GwPMbZhIeZYi_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LCsoQkMCxCM11pNU1Ce_atk_desc
attribs.current:
When a creature within 5 feet of you that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to cause the creature to make a Dexterity saving throw.  The creature takes 2d8 lightning or thunder damage (your choice) on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.
   You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier.  You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCsti4pDGb0c5RV4xFk_description
attribs.current:
As an action, present your holy symbol and speak a prayer censuring the undead.  Each undead that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw.  If the creature fails it saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.
   A turned creature must spend its turn trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you.  It also can't take reactions.  For its action, it can only use the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving.  If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the dodge action.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LCsu6lrQMfQcaapxpwJ_atk_desc
attribs.current:
As an action, present your holy symbol and speak a prayer censuring the undead.  Each undead that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw.  If the creature fails it saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.
   A turned creature must spend its turn trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you.  It also can't take reactions.  For its action, it can only use the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving.  If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the dodge action.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCsuN4OAVZcErvLLeoZ_description
attribs.current: You can use your Channel Divinity to wield the power of the storm with unchecked ferocity.  When you roll lightning or thunder damage, you can use your Channel Divinity to deal maximum damage, instead of rolling.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCsyVnDBPGU28sYqsoV_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCt-jZY8La5aziIJLuD_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCt-jZY8La5aziIJLuD_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 3d8 thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature made of inorganic material such as stone, crystal, or metal has disadvantage on this saving throw.

A nonmagical object that isn't being worn or carried also takes the damage if it's in the spell's area.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCt-jZY8La5aziIJLuD_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCt-suw3sZ3ZmtLiS2n_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.

The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spell's effect resemble that weapon.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCt-suw3sZ3ZmtLiS2n_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot 3rd level of or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for every two slot levels above the 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCt0soieOJ0Ah7bXtG-_spelldescription
attribs.current: Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range each regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCt0soieOJ0Ah7bXtG-_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCtm4F9NgP5i7L0OJUy_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You speak a one-word command to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesn't understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it.

Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so, the DM determines how the target behaves. If the target can't follow your command, the spell ends.

Approach: The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

Drop: The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

Flee: The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

Grovel: The target falls prone and then ends its turn.

Halt: The target doesn't move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft, it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LCtm4F9NgP5i7L0OJUy_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can affect one additional creature for each slot level above 1st. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCw8GVR8gESAsuHoIXh_description
attribs.current:
You have learned techniques to enhance your attacks with certain kinds of spells, gaining the following benefits:

- When you cast a spell that requires you to make an attack roll, the spell's range is doubled.
- Your ranged spell attacks ignore 1/2 and 3/4 cover
- You learn 1 cantrip that requires an attack roll.
 ( Ray of Frost)

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCwAelLTrs6VX7iTrWg_spelldescription
attribs.current:
You manifest a minor wonder, a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range.

• Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute.

• You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.

• You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.

• You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.

• You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.

• You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCwB2XK-KcKpj0GgVWx_spellcomp_materials
attribs.current: A tiny strip of white cloth

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCwB2XK-KcKpj0GgVWx_spelldescription
attribs.current: Your spell bolsters your allies with toughness and resolve. Choose up to three creatures within range. Each target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 5 for the duration.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-2_-LCwB2XK-KcKpj0GgVWx_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, a target's hit points increase by an additional 5 for each slot level above 2nd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LCwBBtaU4809kZpknZl_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A frigid beam of blue-white light streaks toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, it takes 1d8 cold damage, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

The spell's damage increases by 1d8 when you reach 5th level (2d8), 11th level (3d8), and 17th level (4d8).

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCwBvIyxhzULBmdF3Ii_description
attribs.current:
`When you survive to the end of a mission, roll a d10 with disadvantage. Your party recieves an additional ammount of gold for the mission equal to this die roll X 5% of the total monetary gains. 

You must declare the use of this ability before the DM rewards gold. At level 10 you no longer roll this ability with disadvantage. At level 15 you roll this ability with advantage as you up your hustle game

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LDjzzUDAVIef06vFdha_description
attribs.current:
Starting at 5th level, when an undead fails its saving throw against your Turn Undead feature, the creature is instantly destroyed if its challenge rating is at or below a certain threshold, as shown in the Destroy Undead table.
 
 5th - 1/2 or lower CR
8th - 1 or lower CR
11th - 2 or lower CR
14th - 3 or lower CR
17th - 4 or lower CR

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LDk-Thqo5Stz7iRHCsa_spelltarget
attribs.current: Each creature in a 5-foot radius centered on a point you can see within range

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LDk-Thqo5Stz7iRHCsa_spelldescription
attribs.current:
A storm cloud appears in the shape of a cylinder that is 10 feet tall with a 60-foot radius, centered on a point you can see 100 feet directly above you. The spell fails if you can't see a point in the air where the storm cloud could appear (for example, if you are in a room that can't accommodate the cloud).

When you cast the spell, choose a point you can see within range. A bolt of lightning flashes down from the cloud to that point. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d10 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to call down lightning in this way again, targeting the same point or a different one.

If you are outdoors in stormy conditions when you cast this spell, the spell gives you control over the existing storm instead of creating a new one. Under such conditions, the spell's damage increases by 1d10.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LDk-Thqo5Stz7iRHCsa_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher level, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LDk0OLGn22hYYP504me_spelldescription
attribs.current: As you call out words of restoration, up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points equal to 1d4 + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-3_-LDk0OLGn22hYYP504me_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by 1d4 for each slot level above 3rd.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LEW7ZFuhv-wGpzZMPGQ_atk_desc
attribs.current:
`When you survive to the end of a mission, roll a d10 with disadvantage. Your party recieves an additional ammount of gold for the mission equal to this die roll X 5% of the total monetary gains. 

You must declare the use of this ability before the DM rewards gold. At level 10 you no longer roll this ability with disadvantage. At level 15 you roll this ability with advantage as you up your hustle game
